name: Timbuk2 Spire Backpack - Unisex
description: This rolltop backpack is ready for your daily commute or a trip across the globe. Dedicated pockets are designed to carry all your daily essentials, and the padded air mesh shoulder straps and back panel help keep you cool on the way to your destination.High-denier polyester with phthalate-free PVC is durable and weather-resistant.Access the laptop sleeve through the roll top closure or through the incognito back zipper.Internal organizer in the front pocket for pens, phones, and other small stuff.Exterior webbing offers attachment for carabiners, lights or U-lock.Elasticized external side pocket holds a water bottle.
